rules_text:
{T}, Sacrifice this land: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this land: Take to the streets. [i](Put the top card of your library on the battlefield face down with three defense counters. It's a battle protected by an opponent. When it's defeated, exile it. You may play it as long as it remains exiled.)[/i]
